original_text: After Paul had spoken to the important officers of Athens, he left the city. He went from there to the city of Corinth.
korean_text: 그 후에 바울이 아덴을 떠나 고린도에 이르러

sentences.original_text: After Paul had spoken to the important officers of Athens
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 아테네의 중요한 관리들에게 말한 후에

sentences.original_text: He went from there to the city of Corinth
